mimeType.description: The mime type of the content

sizeBytes.description: The size in bytes of the content

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the entity was created

createdById.description: The unique identifier for the api key who created the asset

domain.description: The domain of the asset (Knowledge or Snipet)

executionId.description: The unique identifier for the execution asset

id.description: The unique identifier for the entity

knowledgeId.description: The unique identifier for the knowledge asset

snipetId.description: The unique identifier for the snipet asset

source.description: The source of the asset (USER, AI, SYSTEM, INTEGRATION)

path.description: The path of the storage, where the asset is stored

persisted.description: Indicates if the asset is persisted

provider.description: The provider of the storage, where the asset is stored

type.description: Indicates the type of the asset, if it is a file, text, user question, ai response...

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the entity was last updated
